name: Descend (Not Jam)
description:
Made in Godot // Art made in GIMP // Audio made using Reaper and Renoise

Additional audio samples taken from https://freesound.org

Known Issues

Menu buttons can sometimes be unresponsive on an initial click, but will respond to repeated clicking. 

If clicking is not functioning correctly for you, all menus are fully workable using arrow keys and space bar or d-pad and A/X.

The framerate may drop on older machines. If playing on a laptop, I highly recommend ensuring your device is connected to power to ensure maximum processing power.
